meanings.definition: A person who believes in predestination.
meanings.sent1: The predestinarian was convinced that everything was predetermined.
meanings.sent2: She had a conversation with a predestinarian who explained their beliefs.
meanings.sent3: The predestinarian joked that they were destined to eat pizza for dinner every night.
meanings.sent4: His actions seemed to follow a predestinarian path, as if guided by an unseen force.
meanings.sent5: The predestinarian's faith in predestination was unshakeable.

meanings.definition: Relating to the belief in predestination.
meanings.sent1: The predestinarian doctrine influenced his decisions.
meanings.sent2: She found comfort in the predestinarian teachings.
meanings.sent3: The predestinarian concept seemed to simplify the complexities of life.
meanings.sent4: His predestinarian mindset colored his view of the world.
meanings.sent5: The predestinarian belief shaped their understanding of fate.
